title: Alpha Retail: 120% Growth in 6 Months
excerpt: Alpha Retail migrated to Bravioo and doubled their revenue with omnichannel.
content:
Alpha Retail implemented Bravioo's headless storefront and OMS. Within 6 months, conversion increased by 32% and AOV by 18%.

With unified inventory and marketplace sync, order processing time dropped by 45%.

title: NovaTech: Cross-border Expansion to 12 Countries
excerpt: Cross-border, multi-currency, and localized checkout at scale.
content:
NovaTech used Bravioo's multi-store, multi-currency stack to launch in 12 countries in 90 days.

Checkout latency improved by 40% with edge caching and payment routing.
